snippet: Nick Johnson scored 18 points as No. 2 Arizona (22-1, 9-1 Pacific 12), coming off its first loss of the season, ground out a 67-65 victory at home over Oregon (15-7, 3-7).
abstract: Arizona defeats Oregon, 67-65; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Nick Johnson scored 18 points as No. 2 Arizona (22-1, 9-1 Pacific 12), coming off its first loss of the season, ground out a 67-65 victory at home over Oregon (15-7, 3-7).
